#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int fac(int a)
{
	int fact=1;
	if(a==0)
		return 1;
	else
		for(int i=1;i<=a;i++)
			fact*=i;
	return fact;
}
int ncr(int n,int r)
{
	return fac(n)/(fac(r)*fac(n-r));
}
int main()
{
	int t,k,a[11],var,ntotal,nin,i;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		for(i=0;i<11;i++)
			cin>>a[i];
		cin>>k;
		ntotal=0,nin=0;
		sort(a,a+11);
		var=a[11-k];
		for(i=0;i<11;i++)
		{
			if(a[i]==var)
			{
				ntotal++;
				if(i>=11-k)
					nin++;
			}
		}
		cout<<ncr(ntotal,nin)<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
